Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Westbound Reroute near Chicago/Pine
ShortDescription: Westbound 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Laramie, Division, Central, and Chicago, due to, street blockage near Chicago/Pine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Laramie, Division, Central, and Chicago, due to, street blockage near Chicago/Pine.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
